text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1922 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ; February * 22 – Thorvald Lammers, baritone singer, choral conductor, composer, and biographer (born 1841). ; October * 26 – Theodora Cormontan, pianist, music publisher, and composer (born 1840). ==Births== ; January * 4 – Arvid Gram Paulsen, jazz saxophonist, trumpeter, and composer (died 1963). * 6 – Finn Mortensen, composer, music critic, and music teacher (died 1983). ; February * 18 – Antonio Bibalo, pianist and composer (died 2008). ; June * 10 – Edvard Hagerup Bull, composer (died 2012). * 30 – Hanna-Marie Weydahl, pianist (died 2016). ==See also== * 1922 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1920s in Norwegian music
title: 1922 in Norwegian music
